    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(double x,
                      double y,
                      int numOfSides,
                      double sideLength,
                      double strokeWeight,
                      java.awt.Color strokeColor,
                      java.awt.Color fillColor)
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the triangle
        y - is the y coordinate of the triangle
        sideLength - is the length of each side of the triangle
        strokeWeight - is the thickness of the lines that draw the triangle
        strokeColor - is the color of the lines that draw the triangle
        fillColor - is the color that fills the triangle

      • RegularPolygon

                      double y,
                      double numOfSides,
                      double sideLength,
                      double strokeWeight,
                      java.awt.Color strokeColor)
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the regular polygon
        y - is the y coordinate of the regular polygon
        sideLength - is the length of each side of the regular polygon
        strokeWeight - is the thickness of the lines that draw the regular polygon
        strokeColor - is the color of the lines that draw the regular polygon
